reviews.review: Great game, still fantastic to play
Let us show them who we R!
Otimo jogo me divertia muito quando pequeno e me divirto até hoje
Achei mais divertido que o CS:GO, bastante servidores br.
bought for gmod textures, stayed for random deathmatch games
La verdad muy buen juego, Un DLC de Counter Strike xd y una muy buena comunidad
Joguei um pouco, é bem legal
советую эту игру тем,у кого нет мощного пк.

Played this a bit back in the day before CS:GO was thing, I wasn't all that smart and only played bot matches because I was scared of getting yelled at for being bad at the game. From what I played back in the day, this was a pretty fun game to mess around. I also bought this game just to get the source models for Garry's Mod.
buen juego ahre q no xd vv:

DELICIOSO EL JUEGO LOCO!!!!!!.
ES UN CS Y YA ESTA LOCO, mandale mecha recomendable si querés pasarla piola tranqui con los amiguitos y punto brother:

RECOMENDADO 10 DE 10 = 10/10.
Ахуеная игра рекомендую CSGO Ебаная помойка с читерами
nostalgia pura. não tem como não amar esse jogo.
